mapper.select: SELECT IM.BNKINTERSTITIALMSGKY, IM.ARCLOCALCDKY, IM.CORORGKYFI, IM.BNKINTERSTITIALMSGTYPEKY, IM.ISENABLED, IM.MSGNAME, IM.STARTDTTM, IM.ENDDTTM, IM.DISPLAYCOUNT, IM.HEADERTYPE, IM.HEADERURL, IM.HEADERFILENAME, IM.HEADERCONTENTTYPE, IM.DISCLMRTYPE, IM.DISCLMRFILENAME, IM.DISCLMRCONTENTTYPE, IM.UPDATEDTTM, IM.UPDATEUSER, IM.VERSIONSTAMP, Q.BNKCUSTGRPKY, Q.GROUPQRYNAME, Q.ISSYSADMIN, Q.ISIMPORTED, Q.ISDATAMINING, Q.ISMKTMESSAGE, Q.ISSECMESSAGE, Q.REFRESHFREQCD, Q.UPDATEDTTM, Q.UPDATEUSER, Q.VERSIONSTAMP, Q.GRPCRITERIASTSCD, Q.CORORGKYFI, Q.REFRESHDTTM, Q.ISINTERSTITIALMSG FROM BNKINTERSTITIALMSG IM INNER JOIN BNKINTERSTITIALMSGCUSTGRP IMQ ON IM.BNKINTERSTITIALMSGKY = IMQ.BNKINTERSTITIALMSGKY INNER JOIN BNKCUSTGRP Q ON Q.BNKCUSTGRPKY = IMQ.BNKCUSTGRPKY WHERE IM.BNKINTERSTITIALMSGKY = #{id}

SELECT IM.BNKINTERSTITIALMSGKY, IM.ARCLOCALCDKY, IM.CORORGKYFI, IM.BNKINTERSTITIALMSGTYPEKY, IM.ISENABLED, IM.MSGNAME, IM.STARTDTTM, IM.ENDDTTM, IM.DISPLAYCOUNT, IM.HEADERTYPE, IM.HEADERURL, IM.HEADERFILENAME, IM.HEADERCONTENTTYPE, IM.HEADERCONTENT, IM.HEADERCONTENTTEXT, IM.DISCLMRTYPE, IM.DISCLMRFILENAME, IM.DISCLMRCONTENTTYPE, IM.DISCLMRCONTENT, IM.DISCLMRCONTENTTEXT, IM.UPDATEDTTM, IM.UPDATEUSER, IM.VERSIONSTAMP, Q.BNKCUSTGRPKY, Q.GROUPQRYNAME, Q.ISSYSADMIN, Q.ISIMPORTED, Q.ISDATAMINING, Q.ISMKTMESSAGE, Q.ISSECMESSAGE, Q.REFRESHFREQCD, Q.UPDATEDTTM, Q.UPDATEUSER, Q.VERSIONSTAMP, Q.GRPCRITERIASTSCD, Q.CORORGKYFI, Q.REFRESHDTTM, Q.ISINTERSTITIALMSG, B.BNKINTERSTITIALMSGBUTTONKY, B.BNKINTERSTITIALMSGKY, B.CUSTOMLABEL, B.BUTTONSTYLETYPE, B.DISPLAYORDER, B.BUTTONCODE, B.UPDATEDTTM, B.UPDATEUSER, B.VERSIONSTAMP FROM BNKINTERSTITIALMSG IM INNER JOIN BNKINTERSTITIALMSGBUTTON B ON IM.BNKINTERSTITIALMSGKY = B.BNKINTERSTITIALMSGKY LEFT OUTER JOIN BNKINTERSTITIALMSGCUSTGRP IMQ ON IM.BNKINTERSTITIALMSGKY = IMQ.BNKINTERSTITIALMSGKY LEFT OUTER JOIN BNKCUSTGRP Q ON IMQ.BNKCUSTGRPKY = Q.BNKCUSTGRPKY WHERE IM.BNKINTERSTITIALMSGKY = #{id} ORDER BY B.DISPLAYORDER

SELECT DISTINCT IM.BNKInterstitialMsgKy, IM.DISPLAYCOUNT FROM BNKInterstitialMsg IM INNER JOIN BNKInterstitialMsgCustGrp CG ON IM.BNKInterstitialMsgKy = CG.BNKInterstitialMsgKy INNER JOIN BNKCUSTGRP CUG ON CG.BNKCUSTGRPKY = CUG.BNKCUSTGRPKY INNER JOIN BNKMSGGRPQRYCUSTOMER MGQC ON CUG.BNKCUSTGRPKY = MGQC.BNKCUSTGRPKY WHERE ((MGQC.BNKCUSTOMERKY = #{customerOid,typeHandler=com.s1.arch.ibatis.ObjectIdTypeHandler} AND MGQC.ISUSER = '0') OR (MGQC.BNKUSERKY = #{bnkUserOid,typeHandler=com.s1.arch.ibatis.ObjectIdTypeHandler} AND MGQC.ISUSER = '1')) AND CUG.isInterstitialMsg = '1' AND CUG.GRPCRITERIASTSCD = 1 AND IM.ISENABLED = '1' AND IM.CORORGKYFI = #{affiliateOid,typeHandler=com.s1.arch.ibatis.ObjectIdTypeHandler} AND IM.BNKINTERSTITIALMSGTYPEKY = #{typeOid,typeHandler=com.s1.arch.ibatis.ObjectIdTypeHandler} AND IM.STARTDTTM < #{currentTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND IM.ENDDTTM > #{currentTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND (
IM.ARCLOCALCDKY = #{localeOid,typeHandler=com.s1.arch.ibatis.ObjectIdTypeHandler} OR
IM.ARCLOCALCDKY IS NULL )

SELECT IMCG.BNKINTERSTITIALMSGKY,CQ.BNKCUSTGRPKY ,CQ.GROUPQRYNAME,CQ.ISSYSADMIN,CQ.ISIMPORTED,CQ.ISDATAMINING, CQ.ISMKTMESSAGE,CQ.ISSECMESSAGE,CQ.REFRESHFREQCD,CQ.UPDATEDTTM,CQ.UPDATEUSER,CQ.VERSIONSTAMP,CQ.GRPCRITERIASTSCD, CQ.CORORGKYFI,CQ.REFRESHDTTM,CQ.ISINTERSTITIALMSG FROM BNKInterstitialMsgCustGrp IMCG ,BNKCUSTGRP CQ WHERE CQ.BNKCUSTGRPKY = IMCG.BNKCUSTGRPKY AND IMCG.BNKInterstitialMsgKy IN
#{oid}
mapper.sql: BNKINTERSTITIALMSGKY, ARCLOCALCDKY, CORORGKYFI, BNKINTERSTITIALMSGTYPEKY, ISENABLED, MSGNAME, STARTDTTM, ENDDTTM, DISPLAYCOUNT, HEADERTYPE, HEADERURL, HEADERFILENAME, HEADERCONTENTTYPE, DISCLMRTYPE, DISCLMRFILENAME, DISCLMRCONTENTTYPE, UPDATEDTTM, UPDATEUSER, VERSIONSTAMP
mapper.select:
select
distinct
,
from BNKINTERSTITIALMSG
order by $orderByClause$

select
distinct
from BNKINTERSTITIALMSG
order by ${orderByClause}

DISPLAYCOUNT = #{record.displayCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
